tr.td: 5 reassortants; 4 reassortants with the VP7 specificity for serotype 1, 2, 3, or 4, and 1 reassortant with the VP4 of P1A[8] specificity from the human rotavirus parent strain with the remainder of the genes from the WC3 bovine rotavirus parent
3 oral doses at 2, 4, and 6 months of age
Intussusceptions not seen. Diarrhea and vomiting may occur
No reassortants; attenuation by passage of human rotavirus 89-12 strain in tissue culture
2 oral doses at 2 and 4 months of age
Intussusceptions not seen. Diarrhea and vomiting may occur
